mapper.insert: insert into oc_cust_grp_member (group_id, cust_no, cust_type, group_type, add_time, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update oc_cust_grp_member set cust_type = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_type = #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select group_id, cust_no, cust_type, group_type, add_time, create_user, create_date, create_time, update_user, update_date, update_time, time_stamp, rec_stat from oc_cust_grp_member

select grp.group_id, grp.cust_no,b.cust_nam, grp.cust_type, grp.group_type, grp.add_time, grp.create_user, grp.create_date, grp.create_time, grp.update_user, grp.update_date, grp.update_time, grp.time_stamp, grp.rec_stat from oc_cust_grp_member grp,ec_cust_name b where group_id=#{groupId} and grp.cust_no=b.cust_no and b.rec_stat='0'
